params.account: The address of the account claiming rewards.
params.claimable: The total claimable amount of the reward token.
params.proof: The merkle proof used to validate the claim.
params.reward: The address of the reward token.

params.root: The new root of the merkle tree.

params.token: The address of the token to be withdrawn.

claim(address,address,uint256,bytes32[]).notice: Claims rewards for a specified account.

withdraw(address).notice: Withdraws the entire balance of the specified token from this contract.
